turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to find out where my package is. The tracking says it was supposed to be delivered yesterday, but I haven't received anything.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry to hear that. Could you please provide me with your tracking number so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's ABC123XYZ. This is so frustrating, I really needed this by today! Is there any way to find out exactly where it is?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing that information. Based on the tracking data, your package is currently at the local distribution center. It seems there was a delay due to an operational issue. The estimated delivery time is now tomorrow. I do not have specific details as to the nature of the operational issue, but I apologize for the inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, well, that's better than nothing, I guess. But what *kind* of operational issue? How likely is it to happen again? This is a really important item, and I can't afford to have it delayed again. Can you guarantee it will arrive tomorrow?
